Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 66th overall pick, by Troy in 1964...
Injured on 7/26/1965 with a Pulled Calf Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 5/17/1966 with a Swollen Ear, out for one week...
Injured on 7/6/1967 with a Blister On Finger, out for 4 days...
Injured on 7/25/1968 with a Pulled Achilles Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 6/12/1969 with a Scratched Cornea Eye, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 8/21/1970, off Deacon Burns (WT)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/7/1970, off Stanton Archibald (CI)...
Injured on 6/16/1974 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1974 Allstar game...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Third Base in 1975...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Lynchburg on 5/1/1976...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Third Base in 1976...
Drove in 6 runs against Coney Island on 8/20/1977...
Signed as a free agent by New Jersey on 2/1/1978 to a 6-year deal worth $9,667,200 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1978, hitting .529 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1979, hitting .375 with 4 HR, 18 RBI...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/11/1979 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1980, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 14 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1980, hitting .435 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1981, hitting .542 with 0 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1981, hitting .526 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
